languages.text: {n}Но что-то еще примешивается к их праведному возмущению. Что-то дразнит их, возбуждает, злит. Что-то скверное, витающее в воздухе. Мерзость.{/n}
{n}But there is something else mixed into their righteous indignation, something that taunts them, excites them, angers them. It is something foul, hovering in the air. Aberration.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Но что-то еще примешивается к их праведному возмущению. Что-то дразнит их, возбуждает, злит. Что-то скверное, витающее в воздухе. Мерзость.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}But something else is mixed in with their righteous indignation. Something teases them, excites them, angers them. Something foul, hovering in the air. Anathema.{/n}
{n}But something else is mixed in with their righteous indignation. Something teases them, excites them, angers them. Something foul, hovering in the air. Anathema.{/n}
{n}But there is something else mixed into their righteous indignation, something that taunts them, excites them, angers them. It is something foul, hovering in the air. Aberration.{/n}

{n}But there is something else mixed into their righteous indignation, something that taunts them, excites them, angers them. It is something foul, hovering in the air. Aberration.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aber in ihrer rechtschaffenen Entrüstung liegt noch etwas anderes, etwas das sie verhöhnt, aufstachelt und erzürnt. Es ist schändlich und schwebt in der Luft. Abscheulichkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But there is something else mixed into their righteous indignation, something that taunts them, excites them, angers them. It is something foul, hovering in the air. Aberration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aber in ihrer rechtschaffenen Entrüstung liegt noch etwas anderes, etwas das sie verhöhnt, aufstachelt und erzürnt. Es ist schändlich und schwebt in der Luft. Abscheulichkeit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pero hay algo más mezclado con su indignación justa, algo que les provoca, les incita, les enfurece. Es algo maléfico en el aire. Aberración.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But there is something else mixed into their righteous indignation, something that taunts them, excites them, angers them. It is something foul, hovering in the air. Aberration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pero hay algo más mezclado con su indignación justa, algo que les provoca, les incita, les enfurece. Es algo maléfico en el aire. Aberración.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、彼らの義憤には別の何かが混じっている。彼らを愚弄し、興奮させ、怒らせる何かが。空中に漂う不潔なもの。忌まわしいものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But there is something else mixed into their righteous indignation, something that taunts them, excites them, angers them. It is something foul, hovering in the air. Aberration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、彼らの義憤には別の何かが混じっている。彼らを愚弄し、興奮させ、怒らせる何かが。空中に漂う不潔なもの。忌まわしいものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}然而，他们的义愤之中还夹杂着某些其他东西，嘲笑他们，刺激他们，惹怒他们。那种恶毒的东西在空中盘旋着，那是邪恶之物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But there is something else mixed into their righteous indignation, something that taunts them, excites them, angers them. It is something foul, hovering in the air. Aberration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}然而，他们的义愤之中还夹杂着某些其他东西，嘲笑他们，刺激他们，惹怒他们。那种恶毒的东西在空中盘旋着，那是邪恶之物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mais quelque chose d'autre s'est glissé dans leur indignation, quelque chose qui les provoque, qui les aiguillonne, qui les enrage. Une chose ignoble qui flotte dans l'air. Aberration.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But there is something else mixed into their righteous indignation, something that taunts them, excites them, angers them. It is something foul, hovering in the air. Aberration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mais quelque chose d'autre s'est glissé dans leur indignation, quelque chose qui les provoque, qui les aiguillonne, qui les enrage. Une chose ignoble qui flotte dans l'air. Aberration.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Haklı öfkelerine karışmış bir şey daha var. Onları alaya alan, heyecanlandıran ve öfkelendiren bir şey var. Habis bir şey, havada süzülüp duruyor. Bir sapkı...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But there is something else mixed into their righteous indignation, something that taunts them, excites them, angers them. It is something foul, hovering in the air. Aberration.{/n}
